CustomField.formula: IF(TODAY() - Last_Activity_Date__c < 30, IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=01524000004lpcv", "Green",19, 19), IF(AND(TODAY() - Last_Activity_Date__c > 30, TODAY() - Last_Activity_Date__c < 60), IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=01524000004lpcq", "Amber",19, 19), IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=01524000004lpcl", "Red",19, 19)))
CustomField.label: Activity Rating
